eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Georgia; AT 11:20 AM ON NOV 25, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 05:20 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: We interrupt this program to bring you this important announcement. This is an emergency missing child alert, or Levis Call, the Georgia version of an Amber Alert. The Clayton County Police Department and the GEORGIA BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION are looking for a Silver 2017 Volkswagen Passat Georgia license tag DCA8894. On 11-25-2025 at 0835 am, Roma Williams, 2 months old, black male with black low cut hair and brown eyes and was last seen wearing gray onesie. He was abducted by Tariq Williams, 25 yo Black Male, 57, 120 lbs , with Black hair and Brown eyes. Theres no known clothing description per Clayton County Police. They were last seen at Lake Harbin Road, Rex Georgia Westbound. Roma Williams is believed to be in extreme danger. If you have any information on the whereabouts of Roma Williams or the Silver 2017 Volkswagen Passat Georgia license tag DCA8894 please dial 911. The public can also provide information to the GBI tip line at 1-800-597-TIPS or the See Send app for smartphone users.
